Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Maya's life prior to or as the outbreak began. It is possible she enjoyed cooking.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Maya joined a community called the Alexandria Safe Zone . Maya attends Deanna 's welcoming party for the new arrivals and socializes with the other residents and the new arrivals. She attempts to make friendly conversation with Sasha by asking her what her favorite dish is to make. Sasha is overwhelmed by the woman and the party in general, and snaps at Maya before storming away. While unseen, Maya is among the Alexandrians killed when the herd of walkers break through the damaged portion of the wall and swarm the town. With Maya as one of the casualties of the devastating chain of events in Alexandria, her name is then added to the memorial wall along with the other deceased residents.
Death[]: Killed By Zombies Maya is among the residents killed when a herd of walkers breaks into Alexandria.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Maya has killed: Possibly a few zombies
Trivia[]: Maya is credited as Woman in " Forget ". This character's name is revealed in "The Next World" after her name is added to the memorial wall as a result of the herd that attacked Alexandria, killing several people. [1] Maya is a TV Series adaptation of Barbara from the Comic Series; in the Comic Series, at the welcome party, Michonne snaps at Barbara after being overwhelmed by Barbara's questions. Barbara in the TV Series is an homage to the character of Barbara from Night of the Living Dead .
Name: Maya
